title: How Amazon Predicts What You'll Buy
description: A micro-lesson that makes How Amazon Predicts What You'll Buy usable.

hook.text: Amazon sometimes ships products to warehouses near you before you've even clicked 'buy.'

buildup.text: Their recommendation engine analyzes your browsing, purchases, and what similar users bought.

punchline.text: Amazon knows what you want before you do.
